name: Cube Lands: The Final Wish
description:
Overview


Cube Lands is a puzzle/adventure game based on blocks. Instead of "levels", the puzzles are connected in a giant map made of unique areas. As the hero, you will be on a quest to reach the top of the world and defeat the great evils that await!

Gameplay


Place Elemental Blocks, a new and unique concept for puzzle games, to gain height and activate their effects. You cannot jump, so use them wisely! There is 50+ different and innovative blocks with unique effects for you to discover in the 100+ handmade puzzles this game contains!

Story


There is more to this game than just puzzles! During your adventure, you will find "memories" of an old tale. Discover the truth behind the origin of the Eye and the identity of the Hero and the Princess who traveled together a long time ago!
